overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by 183-day rule or permanent home in Germany.
overview.tax_authority: Federal Central Tax Office (Bundeszentralamt für Steuern)
overview.currency_exchange_rules: Restrictions on currency conversion for non-EU residents.

personal_income_tax.social_security: Employer and employee contribute 18.6% on gross wages (up to a certain income limit).

corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, but foreign tax credit is available.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 25% (reduced rate of 15% for EU/EEA parent companies).

corporate_tax.deductions: Standard deductions for depreciation, interest, and research and development.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Private sale of personal assets is generally exempt.

inheritance_tax.rate: 7% - 30% on inherited assets, depending on the value and relationship to the deceased.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Self-employed individuals with proof of income and health insurance.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Freelancers and remote workers may be eligible for reduced tax rates.
digital_nomad_visa.duration: Usually granted for 6 months to 1 year, renewable.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income, capital gains, and inheritance.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: 0% on crypto capital gains (held more than 1 year).

nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: 0% on NFT capital gains (held more than 1 year).

additional_notes.political_risks: Stable political environment with a strong legal system.
additional_notes.legal_system: Efficient and well-developed legal system for tax disputes.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 17th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
